text: Motontaka ama'n, “mâichâm chunga inbôlna ngei le neinunpêkngei aninônchu sa pum hâlminvâmngei le sietnangei lâk paina ranga inbôlna ngei hah nuom khom nuom mak che, na râi khom minsân mak che a tia.” Hima inbôlna ngei murdi hih Balam dungjûiin pêk nikhomsenla ma anghin a ti ani.
